summary: This document is an email forwarding a voice message to Jeffrey Epstein, sent on July 30, 2019, at 5:20 PM. The email includes an audio attachment of the message, which was sent shortly before Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email is addressed to Jeffrey Epstein, forwarding a voice message to him on July 30, 2019.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to Epstein
events.description: An email was sent to Jeffrey Epstein forwarding a voice message with an audio attachment.

keyFacts: A voice message was forwarded to Jeffrey Epstein via email on July 30, 2019, at 5:20:33 PM.
The email includes an audio file attachment named '0190730 172033.wav'.
This communication occurred shortly before Epstein's death in August 2019.
